name: Sound Transit
overview: Sound Transit operates regional express bus, light rail, and commuter rail services in the central Puget Sound region of Washington state. The Link light rail system connects Seattle, Bellevue, and surrounding communities.

history.title: Sounder Commuter Rail Opens
history.description: Sounder commuter rail service begins operation between Seattle and Tacoma.

history.title: Link Light Rail Opens
history.description: Central Link light rail opens between Westlake and Tukwila International Boulevard.

history.title: Airport Link Extension
history.description: Link light rail extends to Sea-Tac Airport, providing direct rail access to the region's major airport.

history.title: University Link Opens
history.description: University Link extension opens, connecting downtown Seattle to the University of Washington.

history.title: Northgate Link Extension
history.description: Northgate Link extension opens, extending service to Northgate and Roosevelt neighborhoods.

history.title: East Link Opens
history.description: 2 Line (East Link) opens, connecting Seattle to Bellevue and Redmond across Lake Washington.
